original_title: Weird Science: A Gay XXX Parody
overview: The big dance is tonight but Luke Adams is buggin because his parents have grounded him. Charlie Pattinson thinks he can smooth talk him out of thisbut it doesnt go quite as planned. Charlie has no choice but to freeze Lukes parents, thus turning the boys on to one hot threesome!
title: Weird Science: A Gay XXX Parody
